market: AI demand remains real but valuation leadership is rotating from capacity winners to workflow owners that can prove pilot-to-production conversion and recurring economics.
tech: Monetization is strongest in inference efficiency, governed enterprise deployment, and workflow-native software; benchmark theater and generic autonomous-agent claims remain ahead of realized value.
risk: Main downside is capex/payback mismatch compounded by export-control shocks, power bottlenecks, and regulatory liability shifts before cash-flow quality is proven.
